text: Wo le rɔ, ai muso ni ai denilu ni ai la kolofenilu ri to ai la jamana rɔ yan, Musa ka jamana mɛn di ai ma Juridɛn Ba telebɔ rɔ yan. Kɔnin ai mɛnilu ye kɛlɛkɛ cɛɛilu ri, ai bɛɛ ye ai la kɛlɛkɛfenilu ta ka ba tɛɛ ai badenma doilu ɲɛrɔ. Ai ye wa ii dɛmɛn fɔɔ Allabatala wa ii fanan nasii hɛrɛ rɔ, ikomin a ka ai lasii hɛrɛ rɔ yan ɲa mɛn ma. Ai Maari Allabatala ye jamana wo dila ai badenmailu ma. Ai ye wa ii dɛmɛn fɔɔ ii wa jamana wo kɛ ii ta ri. Ii wa ban jamana mirala, ai ri ai kɔsɛ ka na jamana ɲin dɔ yan, Allabatala la baaraden Musa ka mɛn di ai ma ka a kɛ ai ta ri Juridɛn Ba telebɔ rɔ yan.»
